Package gov.nih.nlm.ling.brat

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Annotation
    The interface for an abstract natural language annotation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAnnotation
    The generic implementation of the Annotation interface.
    AnnotationArgument
    Represents a role-argument pair of a more complex Annotation object (RelationAnnotation, EventAnnotation, etc.).
    EventAnnotation
    The class to represent an event annotation.
    ModificationAnnotation
    The class to represent an event modification annotation, such as speculation, negation, or factuality.
    PredicationAnnotation
    The class to represent a Predication annotation.
    Reference
    This class represents a reference from a standoff annotation to a normalized entity in an ontology or terminology.
    RelationAnnotation
    Represents a n-ary relation annotation.
    StandoffAnnotationEvaluator
    The class to compare/evaluate a directory of standoff annotation files against another directory of such files.
    StandoffAnnotationFileComparator
    The class to compare two standoff annotation files for evaluation purposes.
    StandoffAnnotationReader
    A class to read a text file and its corresponding standoff annotation files.
    StandoffAnnotationWriter
    A writer class to output brat-style standoff annotations from a Document.
    StandoffPreAnnotator
    A class with static methods to automatically annotate a text file with a pre-defined list of annotation strings.
    TermAnnotation
    The class to represent a single term annotation.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    StandoffAnnotationReader.AnnotationType
    An enum that associates annotation classes with the prefixes that correspond to it.
